title: The Ivy League
description: When client #326 orders his usual fantasy from Madame Gwen, he gets a lot more than he paid for. He enjoys his night with Sara, a first timer, who fulfills one of his ultimate fantasies. But when Sara starts popping up in unexpected places, she threatens to unravel everything he has worked so hard to achieve.Sara is just trying to fulfill her dreams, and if that means selling something that most would think too precious to put a price on, then so be it. She's a girl with ambition, and she'll do whatever is necessary to attend one of the most prestigious business schools in the country. But when she discovers she is much more acquainted with one of her professors than she ought to be, it proves to have a detrimental affect on her academic career.
author: Ruby Parker
